name: Alone (itch) (MacaGames)
description:
A little, lucid dream.

The game is set in your school. Explore the building, solve a few riddles and find a way to get out of it.

Just avoid unpleasant encounters.


Keyboard controls:

Arrows = Move.

Z = Interact.

Enter = Status Menu.

X = [REDACTED]


You can also play the game in a real Game Boy cartridge. (uhm...) Have fun. 

This is a very small game I used as a "teaser" for my bigger project SEEDS, please check it out ---> SEEDS

The game has been tested but you might still encounter a few bugs, I reccomend to save the game whenever you can.

- Made with GB Studio 2.0.0-beta4 (thanks Chris) and ♡ for old games.
